Mode1Desc: Enter the patch link to download the specified version of the PS4 game (applicable to PS4/PS5 consoles)
Mode2Desc: Block the update server to prevent game updates, download version 1.0 of the PS4 game (only applicable to PS4 consoles)
ServerRunningCannotSelectMode: Server is running, cannot select mode
NoModeSelectedWarning: No mode selected, the server will start as a regular proxy server.
m2desc1: 1.Block the update server to bypass patch detection and download only the version 1.0 of the game.
m2desc2: 2.Due to certain reasons, this mode is only applicable for PS4. Using it on PS5 may result in downloading the latest version or an error code NW-102650-4.
portused: Port is occupied, please enter a new port (1024-65535)
plsinputjson: Please enter the correct JSON link
serverstartfailed: Start failed, close other programs to avoid network conflicts, or change port
Blocked: Unable to connect to the PS4 game update server (this error prevents PS5 from downloading version 1.0)
Blocked2: PS4 update server address is blocked by DNS error.
neterror: Blocked by update, please try again
other_error1: 1.Log error'Failed to start proxy server, please try another PORT':Try a few ports or restart the computer.
other_error2: 2.The local IP is not the correct segment, check if the computer has a virtual NIC, if it does, temporarily disable it.
Blocked_PS4: Unable to connect to the PS4 game update server, check update failed
CUSAMismatch: The game's CUSA ID does not match(different version). For example, trying to download the EU version but entering the US version JSON.
SpecialIssue: Encountered a special game that cannot be downgraded. Such games have a smaller size after a certain update, so they cannot be downgraded on PS5, only on PS4,like SKUL HERO SLAYER,SYPHON FILTER 3. Refer to the user guide for details.
